
```{r}
# Load necessary package
library(dplyr)

# Sample data with missing values
df <- data.frame(
  id = 1:10,
  score = c(5, 8, NA, 7, NA, 6, 9, 10, NA, 4)
)

df



```

```{r}
# Mean Imputation
mean_value <- mean(df$score, na.rm = TRUE)
df$score_mean_imp <- ifelse(is.na(df$score), mean_value, df$score)

mean_value
```

```{r}
# Median Imputation
median_value <- median(df$score, na.rm = TRUE)
df$score_median_imp <- ifelse(is.na(df$score), median_value, df$score)

median_value
```

```{r}
# Mode Function (Base R)
get_mode <- function(v) {
  uniq_vals <- unique(v[!is.na(v)])
  uniq_vals[which.max(tabulate(match(v, uniq_vals)))]
}

mode_value <- get_mode(df$score)
df$score_mode_imp <- ifelse(is.na(df$score), mode_value, df$score)

df


```

```{r}
# using dplyr

# Using mutate and replace_na
df_dplyr <- df |>
  select(id, score) |>
  mutate(
    score_mean_imp = if_else(is.na(score), mean(score, na.rm = TRUE), score),
    score_median_imp = if_else(is.na(score), median(score, na.rm = TRUE), score),
    score_mode_imp = if_else(is.na(score), get_mode(score), score)
  )

df_dplyr
```
